title: Desert Hearts (1985) Lesbian Drama DVD MGM
description:
Desert Hearts is the all-time classic lesbian favorite romantic film!

Based on Jane Ruleâ€˜s novel â€œDesert of the Heart,â€ the movie tells the story of Vivian Bell (Helen Shaver), a repressed English professor who goes to Reno for a quickie divorce in 1959. She spends the weeks waiting for her final divorce papers at a dude ranch where she meets Cay Rivvers (Patricia Charbonneau), a beautiful young casino worker. Cay is a free spirit â€“ an artist by day and casino worker by night, as well as a lesbian. Her surrogate mother Frances (Audra Lindley in an amazing departure from her comic role in â€œThreeâ€™s Companyâ€) disapproves of her lifestyle, while also craving Cayâ€™s affection and attention.

To everyoneâ€™s surprise, Vivian and Cay hit it off immediately as Cay introduces the shy academic to the wild-west casino scene as well as the breathless beauty of the desert. Itâ€™s not long before Vivian finds her friendship moving into unexpected passion. And for Cay, itâ€™s the first time she has met someone who stirs her deepest emotions.
